SURPRISE

SURPRISE
It's when someone plans out a vacation for you, without telling you where you're going! They just tell you what to pack.

SURPRISE
It's like a bit more exciting than just packing your bags and going. I mean, sometimes you need a bit of uncertainty!

SURPRISE
It's for anyone who wants to go on a holiday, but doesn't want the stress and expectations of a normal planned holiday.

SURPRISE
